parameters.name: X-Fc-Account-Id
parameters.description: The ID of your Alibaba Cloud account.

parameters.name: X-Fc-Date
parameters.description: The time when Function Compute API is called. Specify the time in the **EEE,d MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss GMT** format.

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description:
The Alibaba Cloud Resource Name (ARN) of the resource. 

> You can use the value of this parameter to query the information about the resource, such as the account, service, and region information of the resource. You can manage tags only for services for top level resources.
